element.name: RestoreBackup
element.short: Restore the database from a backup file.

element.name: OnBackupProgress
element.short: Event OnProgress for the backup/restore process.

element.name: RunStartupBackup
element.short: Create a database backup at Application start.

element.name: VacuumIntoBackup
element.short: Create a new vacuumed database backup
element.descr: It uses the SQL command VACUUM INTO. It is faster than the standard SQLite backup.

element.name: BackupSettings
element.short: Create a new backup of Xolmis settings

element.name: RestoreSettings
element.short: Restore the Xolmis settings from a backup file
